message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled value. In this first round, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $850000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000 for your product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of that, I am proposing a counteroffer of $800000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value we've put into creating this exceptional item while remaining competitive in the market.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. After considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $775000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering the quality and uniqueness of the item, I am willing to negotiate further. My latest counteroffer is $790000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $785000 for the product.

Thank you for your patience and consideration, Bob. I understand your perspective and am willing to adjust our negotiations. My latest counteroffer is $795000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value and is within the range you're comfortable with.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $790000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and understanding. My final counteroffer is $792500 for the product. I believe this price offers a fair compromise between the value of the item and your budget.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $790000 for the product.
